H0.text: Yuan Yuan was caught carrying drugs for which Chinese team. Ran

H1.text: Yuan Yuan was caught carrying drugs for which Chinese team. Jumped

H2.text: Yuan Yuan was caught carrying drugs for which Chinese team. Threw

H3.text: Yuan Yuan was caught carrying drugs for which Chinese team. Swam

A4.text: Yuan Yuan, a swimmer caught by Australian customs on 8 January with human growth hormones in her suitcase, was given a four-year suspension.
